Key Match Events: Alexis Mac Allister scored the opening goal three minutes after the break
Julian Alvarez scored a long-range effort in the 84th minute
Paulo Dybala found the net in stoppage time to seal the victory
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina looked dominant and untroubled by the absence of talismans Lionel Messi and Angel Di Maria
Post-Match Reflections: The win left Argentina with 18 points, five clear of second-placed Uruguay
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a World Cup qualifier
Others: Argentina will play at Colombia in a rematch of the Copa America final on Tuesday
Chile hosts Bolivia, who beat Venezuela earlier on Thursday
